part.Name: Description
part.Short: Devouted to the divinity of the Light of Fire, the akatylian =pronouns.sibling= remains faithful with the hierarchy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Forsaken by Arekane Arkane's leadership over her brothers and sisters, =pronouns.subjective= devoutly follows the path of Arekena Azkedara.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Devouted to the divinity of the Light of Fire, the xyatylian =pronouns.sibling= remains faithful with the hierarchy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Forsaken by Arekane Arkane's leadership over her brothers and sisters, =pronouns.subjective= devoutly follows the path of Arekena Azkedara.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Standing amongst the prey, =pronouns.possessive= eyes glimmer with a deep desire to consume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The elderly =pronouns.parent= cares for =pronouns.possessive= =pronouns.offspring=. Standing with =pronouns.possessive= her family, =pronouns.subjective= teaches them to hunt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Swallower of life. Embracer of desire. The once gentle giant now seeks only to consume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Large but youthful. =pronouns.subjective= watches for prey to bring home to =pronouns.possessive= =pronouns.offspring=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The =pronouns.sibling= to arkaedus, resembles all but wings and size. Instead =pronouns.subjective= bears a potent sting.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Standing with pride. =pronouns.subjective= watches over =pronouns.possessive= pack as a =pronouns.parent=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Horns carved by =pronouns.possessive= own hand. Fangs sharpened by =pronouns.possessive= own claws.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The arinat made only deadlier by =pronouns.possessive= anatomy. Wielding anything =pronouns.subjective= can find.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The =pronouns.offspring= of arkaedus and rinat. =pronouns.sibling= of voderai and rinate.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Standing tall amongst =pronouns.possessive= half-blood family. =pronouns.subjective= bears the visage of a fierce leader.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: elden fangs chipped, where a horn is halved. =pronouns.possessive= age and scars bear little impact upon =pronouns.possessive= fierce will.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Youthful and ambitious, the fanged voderai hunts. =pronouns.possessive= horns bear a mere scratch from a recent duel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A devilish visage born from a close relative to voderai. =pronouns.subjective= bears sharpened fangs, to subdue =pronouns.possessive= prey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.subjective= stands before =pronouns.possessive= kindred horns arching high. =pronouns.possessive= will steadfast, before the pack.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prolonged starvation has effected =pronouns.possessive= mind. Not even =pronouns.possessive= fellow pack members are safe from =pronouns.possessive= instinctual hunger.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The seasoned hunter prowls amongst =pronouns.possessive= kindred as a elderly =pronouns.parent= of the hunt. =pronouns.possessive= aged feathers glisten vibrently within the light, and =pronouns.subjective= senses prey with ease.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Driven to =pronouns.possessive= instict, =pronouns.subjective= hunts without thought. In a pouncing stance: =pronouns.subjective= prepares to devour!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The voderai hunts and eats only to stave of =pronouns.possessive= instinct. For if =pronouns.subjective= were to give in: the prey might be =pronouns.possessive= most treasured.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.subjective= licks =pronouns.possessive= paws, as a cat would it's. =pronouns.subjective= barks and growls, as a wolf to prey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Upon a Girdle of feathery fur, the =pronouns.offspring= becomes =pronouns.parent=. With a ridged beak sharply hooked, the =pronouns.parent= becomes =pronouns.sibling=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: With glistening feathers soaked within fresh saliva =pronouns.subjective= merely speaks with a natural hiss. But upon sensing prey =pronouns.subjective= prepares to pounce.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cunning, resolute, and wise. =pronouns.subjective= stands tall as feathers shimmer in the light, watching forth until the prowl return.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bearing down on all four paws =pronouns.subjective= has succumbed to =pronouns.possessive instinctual hunger as =pronouns.subjective= had sought to avoid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There's a glance of hunger in =pronouns.possessive= eyes. What's on =pronouns.possessive= mind, is only known to =pronouns.reflexive=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.possessive= stature stands to be of =pronouns.possessive= kindreds archaic form. Feathers speckled with colour, indicate =pronouns.subjective= is on the elderly path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Aged with guilded colour, =pronouns.subjective= watches over =pronouns.possessive= pack. Like a =pronouns.parent= and =pronouns.sibling=, =pronouns.subjective= cares for =pronouns.possessive= adopted family.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: What level of friendliness the voderaskidaly had matters little now as =pronouns.subjective= prowls the dense flora for a means of satiation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Although small, =pronouns.subjective= has feed many of =pronouns.possessive= fellow voderai. The glistening of =pronouns.possessive= feathers, dedicate 1000s of years to =pronouns.possessive= age.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The size of the prey matters little, for =pronouns.possessive=. For as long as =pronouns.subjective= can consume it: =pronouns.possessive= instinctual hunger will be satisfied.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Small and fiesty, wills this =pronouns.sibling= of the hunt. =pronouns.subjective= stalks the flora, waiting to pounce upon =pronouns.possessive= next meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Small and youthful, =pronouns.subjective= plays within the flora. =pronouns.subjective= feathers whilst filled with colour, are yet fully pigmented indicating =pronouns.subjective= is far from elderly status.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Elden feathers glisten in the light. =pronouns.subjective= may be old, however =pronouns.possessive= youthful spirit remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soaring high admist the dense foliage of the trees, echoes forth a blast of pure vocality upon the apex's unwary prey.

part.Name: Preacher
part.Frozen: The preacher mumbles inaudibly, encased in ice.

part.Name: Preacher
part.Frozen: The preacher mumbles inaudibly, encased in ice.

part.Name: Preacher
part.Frozen: The preacher mumbles inaudibly, encased in ice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Standing tall with little care, =pronouns.subjective= bears a calm but ambitious will.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fire sparks from the eye of the talvix. A glancing image of =pronouns.possessive= calm embers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.possessive= midnight eyes glow in the night. The penumbral being cares little for the light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Even as the Avenkyri aged, =pronouns.subjective= are still yet a young passionate soul within the vessel of the elden arkaedus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Elden feathers mark the eikal veskerai with guilded affinity. Nonetheless =pronouns.possessive= birthright, is forsaken by arrogance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cybernetics form in place of a arm and leg. The observant glare of the doctor casts a shadow upon =pronouns.possessive= loyal subjects.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The eikals bear a visage that demands the will of those around as =pronouns.subjective= speak in a tone that beckons to those with little reasoning, and =pronouns.possessive= gaze is that of authority as order and lies intertwine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "Of the 3 moons, Eilasalia's champion remained. They were named captain and granted a blade of light! Twas only when Arekane, Arkane beckoned forth. That the captain would turn on the Veidencyri, and cast forth Dorator and its 9 moons to oblivion! For this sin, I recant my title as Arekena. And I shall sware to my former title, to end my akatylian brother's heresy!" -Xyatylian Arekena, Azkedara after the betrayal in year 130ae

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calm cinders of fire's light. Cinders of flame born to light. Words spark from written flame.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "The alluring light burns with passionate flame. A song echoes the flame that burns within the heart. A fiery heart that beckons the love of those around. For even a mere spark can set a world alight." -Excerpt from, Alvaneia's upon the flame's sun

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "A flame kindled from the depths of Hell. An angel of fire bursts forth upon the world. An eye blazing with hellish flame. For the Hand of Kata, fires his hellish shot." -Excerpt from, Alvaneia's upon the flame's sun

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Divine flame is sparked upon the world. Yet she cares not for her birthright, but for those around.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glancing into the eyes of the voracious giant, one sees desire, lust, and sin, however even with her habits: the daughter of voderai and avyrialus, emits a calm, affectionate, almost maternal feeling.

tag.Name: staticFaction3
tag.Value: SyrnlRF,hate,the disappearance of a high councillor after their date

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Her tail splayed out like a fan, her name indicating she's a swallower of delight. She cares for her siblings, as though they were her puffs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The curved horns she bears give her a fierce visage. One may mistake her dull feathers tinged with crimson gold as masculine, however her form is one of duality.

tag.Name: Gender
tag.Value: dorator fluid fem,dorator fluid masc,dorator nonbinary

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The incendiery glare of a perceptive arkaedus, bears disdain for humanity's history. He cares little for mortals, and prefers peace.

tag.Name: staticFaction2
tag.Value: Talfieran,dislike,=pronouns.possessive= attitude toward Varinesa before =pronouns.subjective= left

tag.Name: staticFaction3
tag.Value: ,dislike,besting their champion at a local drinking competition

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This voderaskidaly waves her tail erratically, as she prances around the place. With each sway of her tail: she emits a youthful aura.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: She watches over the den like a mother her youth. For she and the wet seer she protects, albeit horned and fanged: are bonded by birth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The little flower blossoms into a calm centuryling, as she retains her mother's youthful wisdom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The eyes of the wet seer have all but faded. Her gifted forsight of the past, is the distant memories of others.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: What grand intoxicating innocence weighs =pronouns.possessive= head upon the mantle of harbinger. =pronouns.Subjective= gaze upon the world as though it was =pronouns.substantivePossessive=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The child of chaos has awaken from =pronouns.possessive= youthful slumber. =pronouns.Possessive= maw glistens with chaotic flame.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fallen eidrati lays at rest, yet what remains is but one vessel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The majesty of =pronouns.possessive= size beckons a chaotic will. The glistening of =pronouns.possessive= maw burns with frozen light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Upon =pronouns.possessive= lengthy body shines scales of divine will. The haze of =pronouns.possessive= breath melts the very air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Splintered horns engraved with archaic symbols. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes glisten in vibrant shade as =pronouns.subjective= bear precedence upon a spindled immensity.
